attributes.action: all british soldiers deaths on bbc headline news
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: bbc should make the tradgic deaths of all millitary personell the headline on the news/not following some inane worrys about the weather/or some footballers wife got a new hair doo! have some respect/the familys of the soldiers deserve more as do the soldiers you! send out

rejection.details: The PM takes very seriously the tragic deaths of military personnel. However, the BBC is entirely independent of government and the PM can not dictate which stories it chooses to cover. We suggest you contact the broadcaster directly with your request.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
